content.raw:
With the drcsim 4.2.0-2~trusty deb, I can confirm the failure when I run the following:
~~~
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_v4_bringup.launch
~~~
but is that launch file intended to be used directly? I know it is included by other launch files. The following works for me:
~~~
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch model_args:=_v4
~~~
Could this be a case of using the wrong launch files?

I'll test the r2 simulator as well.
content.html:
With the drcsim 4.2.0-2~trusty deb, I can confirm the failure when I run the following:

roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_v4_bringup.launch

but is that launch file intended to be used directly? I know it is included by other launch files. The following works for me:

Could this be a case of using the wrong launch files?

I'll test the r2 simulator as well.
